name: Tappy Plane v1
description:
Tappy Plane was made using the Construct's Tappy Plane tutorial.

To play you have to tap the screen (or click, if you're on a computer) to make the plane go up.

There is no win state,  just try to fly through the cave and not crash and burn.

I've made some mods to the game;

  • The Title Screen fades to black before the game starts.
  • Gas Tanks that fill fuel, if you run out of fuel, you will crash.
  • Reset Button that does exactly what a reset button should do. 
  • Puffs of smoke come out the back of the plane when you fly.

Coming Soon:

Mute Button
